messageMail.subject: You got a Migree-mail from {0}
messageMail.message:
{0}

Answer to this message by visiting http://migree.se/message/{1} . Be cautious, always meet in a public place.

registrationMail.subject: Welcome to Migree
registrationMail.message:
Thank you for your registration, {0}!

We really hope you will enjoy the Migree app. As a registered member of Migree you will now be able to use the matching system to find new friends in the same area of expertise as you. The match system will ensure that you both share similar expertise and professional background. Now head on back to http://migree.se, login and start making new friends.

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at http://bit.ly/1M2MpU0

Sincerely,
Migree Team

initPasswordResetMail.subject: A password reset has been requested
initPasswordResetMail.message:
A password reset has been requested. If you want to reset your password, please use http://migree.se/user/{0}/reset/{1} 

If you haven´t requested a reset, please ignore this message

finishedPasswordResetMail.subject: Your password has been changed
finishedPasswordResetMail.message: Your password has been changed for your Migree login

home.title: Come join us!
home.description: Migree is an unique tool for connecting immigrants with swedes based on their professional skills.
home.loginTitle: Register now to start making new friends.

resetPassword.title: Forgot password?
resetPassword.description: Reset your password by entering the e-mail you used when registering below

finishPasswordReset.title: Finish password reset
finishPasswordReset.description: Reset your password to be able to log in again

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: We can´t seem to find the page you are looking for. Please go back and try again.

thankYou.title: Thank you for your registration
thankYou.description: Yor are now logged in and can start making new friends. Go to the matches page and start talking.

messages.title: Discussions
messages.noMessages: Go to matches to find person to start discussion with

register.step1Description: To get started we need to know a few things about you. First, select if you need help or if you want to help.
register.terms: By registering, you accept receiving occasional e-mails and notifications from Migree. No spam, we promise.
register.step2Description: Please provide some information about your skills. This helps making the matching process more accurate.
register.titlePersonalInfo: Add some more information about yourself.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Have you missed to add your right skills? No worry, just update the things you need below
settings.titlePersonalInfo: Add some more information about yourself.
settings.isPublicLabel: I want people to find me

matches.emptyState: Oh no! We couldn't find any matches for you. Try again later.

errorMessages.invalidGrant: Something went wrong, please try again
errorMessages.userPasswordOld: Reset link was to old, please redo
